gov.nasa.jpf.vm

Class FieldLockInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.nasa.jpf.vm.FieldLockInfo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cloneable

    public abstract class FieldLockInfo
extends Object
implements Cloneable
    class encapsulating the lock protection status for field access instructions. Used by on-the-fly partial order reduction in FieldInstruction to determine if a GET/PUT_FIELD/STATIC insn has to be treated as a boundary step (terminates a transition). If the field access is always protected by a lock, only the corresponding sync (INVOKExx or MONITORENTER) are boundary steps, thus the number of states can be significantly reduced. FieldLockInfos are only used if vm.por.sync_detection is set NOTE this might involve assumptions that can be violated in subsequent paths, and might cause potential races to go undetected
